actions.text: Amendment SA 1637 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 1637 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hoeven. (consideration: CR S7470; text: CR S7490) To amend the authorization of appropriations for the Native American languages grant program under section 803C of the Native American Programs Act of 1974.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1637 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hoeven.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1637 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To amend the authorization of appropriations for the Native American languages grant program under section 803C of the Native American Programs Act of 1974.
